text: Teresita Leonardo-De Castro (born Teresita Jose Leonardo on October 8, 1948) was the 24th Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines from August 25 to October 10, 2018. She replaced Maria Lourdes Sereno, who was removed from office. After her retirement, she surpassed the record of former Chief Justice Pedro Yap of being the shortest tenured Chief Justice. ==References== ==Other websites== * Justice Teresita J. title: Teresita de Castro
